law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VI, sec. 616, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 13, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 9, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Coordination of local educational improvement plan with master inservice educational plan -- Technical assistance by department.
